name: Axon Enterprise, Inc.
description: Axon Enterprise, Inc. is a leading technology company that specializes in developing advanced public safety solutions, primarily known for its law enforcement tools including body cameras and digital evidence management software. Founded in 1993, originally as TASER International, the company rebranded to Axon in 2017, reflecting its broader commitment to improving public safety and law enforcement through innovation. Axon's flagship products, such as the Axon Body Camera and Axon Evidence digital platform, empower police departments to enhance accountability, transparency, and operational efficiency. The company also offers a suite of software solutions for managing and analyzing video footage, streamlining case management, and facilitating real-time data sharing. With a mission to protect life and uphold justice, Axon invests heavily in research and development, focusing on artificial intelligence and machine learning to advance public safety technologies. The company aims to create a safer world through its innovative products and services, which are now used by thousands of law enforcement agencies worldwide. In addition to its core product offerings, Axon also advocates for policies that support ethical policing and the responsible use of technology in law enforcement.
